cz.ive.gui
Interface Viewpoint

All Known Implementing Classes:
GraphAreaPanel, HiLODPanel, ZoomScrollPanel
public interface Viewpoint

Iface for definition of the graphical viewpoint.

Author:
Ondra

visible

boolean visible(java.awt.Rectangle rect)
Is the given rectangle visible from this viewpoint?

Parameters:
rect - Rectangle to be queried for visibility
Returns:
TRUE iff some part of the given rectangle might be inside the view.

visible

boolean visible(java.awt.Point point)
Is the given point visible from this viewpoint?

Parameters:
point - Point to be queried for visibility
Returns:
TRUE iff the point might be inside the view

getZoom

int getZoom()
Retrieves zoom in this view.

Returns:
zoom associted with this viewpoint. If the value is positive, scale is reduced by 1:value returned
